effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If a target has P<2, their stability is reduced to 0 and they move 2 additional squares whenever they are force moved (save ends).

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Until the start of the essence's next turn, the target has cold immunity 5.

Until the end of the encounter, the ground within 1 square of the target is a pool of water that is difficult terrain. This water extends out behind the target as they move, creating a stream that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any enemy who ends their turn in the stream and has M<2 is slowed (save ends).

items.name: Sea-Salted Wounds
items.trigger: An ally deals rolled damage to the target.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The essence makes a free strike against the target.
The essence can't be restrained, slowed, or knocked prone, and they ignore difficult terrain.
Whenever the essence starts their turn in a space containing water, they can fly until the end of their turn. While flying, the essence doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
